title: New Pixel 2 - 1 hour on screen and 20% battery, low capacity
content:
Hello! 

I bought a new Pixel 2 from alieexpress. Seller claims that it is a new original phone, but app AccuBattery shows that i have only 50% of capacity. 
On max battery - time on screen can be only 3 hours. 

Is it possible that I was cheated by the seller that it is a new device?
